title: ReSetna
description: In a world where organic life has long since perished, ReSetna is awakened by APEX AI to confront the growing threat of the mysterious Signal. As the Signal spreads chaos, disrupting the balance of the world and driving robots to madness, ReSetna, a combat -ready robot with advanced technology, must uncover the truth behind this disturbance and eliminate the Signal’s influence. With her loyal drone companion IXA, ReSetna traverses a crumbling world, piecing together the secrets of Project Ascendance while battling fierce enemies and uncovering a dark history. The Stone of Madness

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
